events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but it doesn't fit at all. I'd like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's request concerns a refund due to sizing issues with the jacket.
Assigning the case to the refunds team for further processing of the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you want to request a refund for your jacket. I’m here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been worn or damaged in any way?
Sure, my order number is 87456321. The jacket is brand new and hasn’t been worn outside the house.
Thank you for the info. We will issue the refund once we receive the returned jacket. I will email you the return shipping label shortly.
That sounds great, thank you! I’ll send the jacket back as soon as I get the label.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your refund. You should see the amount reflected in your account shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
We are closing this case now. Thank you for your patience and please contact us if you have any further questions.
